longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry issued to
  nationals of Croatia must be valid for the period of
  intended stay. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of a National ID Card issued to nationals of
  Croatia. 
- Holders of emergency or temporary passports.

VISA NOT REQUIRED.

Minors:
- All minors who are nationals of Croatia are expected to hold
  their own travel document. 
- WARNING! In accordance with European Union (EU) Legislation,
  all minors who are nationals of Croatia will be expected to
  hold their own passport or National ID Card (where
  applicable) when departing from Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus,
  Romania or a Schengen Member State . 
Additional Information:
- National visas issued by Bulgaria are only accepted when
  contained in a valid travel document
